name: Photostory Deluxe Project
summary: An MPH file is a project created by MAGIX Photostory Deluxe, a Windows application used to create slideshow presentations. It typically contains imported images, video, and audio clips organized on a timeline and added transitions, effects, and titles. MPH files also store settings for the project, including the aspect ratio and resolution.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
